'''Sumai''' is a blood oath in the law of the [[Essos|eastern]] city of [[Qarth]]. It allows a resident of the city to vouch for outsiders who wish to enter it. The one who invokes it must cut the palm of a hand and show the wound.
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, there is no mention of Sumai or any similar blood oath. Daenerys is not refused entrance into Qarth. On the contrary, she's welcomed and well treated because her dragons are considered a marvel.
